reviews.review_msg: Was taught by him for a Muslim Culture class at U of C. Was horrible with our software (d2l) and we literally would submit quizzes by email (??). Seemed nice, but lectures were really poorly explained and formatted, he went so fast and assumed that everyone knew Arabic or was Muslim which wasn't fair. Ended up being very unreasonable w/ final grade

By far the best professor I've had in my 2 years at SFU. He is always there to help, and will reply to emails within 4 hours after sending them. His teaching methods always make the class interesting and relevant. Highly recommend!
So GREAT! So HELPFUL! Always provided lots of feedback. Very easy to approach!
